00039 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042 #ifndef PIZ_TYPES_H
00043 #define PIZ_TYPES_H
00044 
00045 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 
00048 /**
00049  * \brief   Error codes.
00050  * \ingroup types
00051  */
00052  
00053 typedef enum {
00054     PIZ_GOOD    =  0,                       /*!< No error. */
00055     PIZ_ERROR   =  1,                       /*!< Generic error. */
00056     PIZ_MEMORY  =  2                        /*!< Memory allocation error. */
00057     }PIZError;
00058 
00059 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 
00062 /**
00063  * \brief   Magic numbers.
00064  * \ingroup types
00065  */
00066  
00067 typedef enum {
00068     PIZ_MAGIC_SCALE      = 12,               /*!< Chromatic scale size. */
00069     PIZ_MAGIC_CHANNEL    = 16,               /*!< Maximum midi channel. */
00070     PIZ_MAGIC_VELOCITY   = 127,              /*!< Maximum midi velocity. */
00071     PIZ_MAGIC_PITCH      = 127               /*!< Maximum midi pitch. */
00072     }PIZMagic;
00073 
00074 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 
00077 /**
00078  * \brief Compute the maximum of \a x and \a y.
00079  * \ingroup types
00080  */
00081  
00082 #ifndef MAX
00083 #define MAX(x,y) ((x)>(y)?(x):(y))
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 /**
00087  * \brief Compute the minimum of \a x and \a y.
00088  * \ingroup types
00089  */
00090  
00091 #ifndef MIN
00092 #define MIN(x,y) ((x)<(y)?(x):(y))
00093 #endif
00094 
00095 /**
00096  * \brief Compute absolute value of \a x.
00097  * \ingroup types
00098  */
00099  
00100 #ifndef ABS
00101 #define ABS(x) ((x)<0?-(x):(x))
00102 #endif
00103 
00104 /**
00105  * \brief Keep \a x between \a a and \a b.
00106  * \ingroup types
00107  */
00108  
00109 #ifndef CLAMP
00110 #define CLAMP(x,a,b) ((x)<(a)?(a):(x)>(b)?(b):(x))
00111 #endif
00112 
00113 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 
00116 /**
00117  * \def     true 
00118  * \brief   Boolean value.
00119  * \ingroup types
00120  */
00121  
00122 /**
00123  * \def     false 
00124  * \brief   Boolean value.
00125  * \ingroup types
00126  */
00127  
00128 /**
00129  * \def     bool 
00130  * \brief   Boolean type.
00131  * \ingroup types
00132  */
00133  
00134 #ifndef __cplusplus
00135     #ifndef __bool_true_false_are_defined
00136         #define true                            1
00137         #define false                           0
00138         #define bool                            long
00139         #define __bool_true_false_are_defined   1
00140     #endif
00141 #endif
00142 
00143 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 
00146 /**
00147  * \brief   Hide the function in the exported symbol table.
00148  * \ingroup types
00149  */
00150  
00151 #ifndef WIN_VERSION
00152     #define PIZ_LOCAL  __attribute__ ((visibility("hidden")))
00153 #else
00154     #define PIZ_LOCAL  
00155 #endif
00156 
00157 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00158 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00159 
00160 /**
00161  * \def     PIZ_INLINE
00162  * \brief   Inline the function.
00163  * \ingroup types
00164  */
00165  
00166 #ifndef WIN_VERSION
00167     #define PIZ_EXTERN_INLINE
00168     #define PIZ_INLINE inline
00169     #define PIZ_EXTERN extern inline
00170 #else
00171     #define PIZ_INLINE 
00172 #endif
00173 
00174 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00175 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 
00177 /**
00178  * \brief   For C++ linker.
00179  * \ingroup types
00180  */
00181  
00182 #ifdef __cplusplus
00183     #define PIZ_START_C_LINKAGE \
00184         extern "C" {
00185 #else
00186     #define PIZ_START_C_LINKAGE //
00187 #endif 
00188 
00189 /**
00190  * \brief   For C++ linker.
00191  * \ingroup types
00192  */
00193  
00194 #ifdef __cplusplus
00195     #define PIZ_END_C_LINKAGE \
00196         }
00197 #else
00198     #define PIZ_END_C_LINKAGE //
00199 #endif 
00200
